typedef real T;

class C;
    typedef int T;
    extern function T f();
    extern function real f2();
endclass

function C::T C::f();
    // the return must use the scope resolution
    // since the type is defined within the class
    return 1;
endfunction

function real C::f2();
    return 1.0;
endfunction
